tweet: IOTA Introduces Azimuth (previously known as NB-PoW): A different approach to proof of work that we are working on as part of our long-term vision for IOTA. Read more about it on the blog and get involved today:  https://t.co/qZ3GTCU5jP #IOTA #Azimuth

We are proud to announce the IOTA research team's paper on Achieving Fairness in the Tangle through an Adaptive Rate Control Algorithm was accepted and presented at IEEE ICBC in Seoul. Read more about it on the blog today!  https://t.co/OpeFg9j8XJ #IOTA #IEEE

Waiting for the #IOTA test-net gives me time to tell you some neat perks. -Setting up a node will be a one-click solution(!) -Autopeering(!) -Permissionless -Bad nodes lose mana for misbehavior -If they stay bad for a long time, they won't find other nodes -I can't wait! 🌪️

I dislike mining for ecological reasons. But PoW is also a problem in the #IoT where small devices cannot work as hard as the network demands. The solution: Azimuth! The future of DLT is green, lightweight, without mining, fees or centralization! #IOTA  https://t.co/Rin4mVfwgD

#IOTA continues getting adopted by more and more: corporations, cities, NGOs and startups. This is no surprise as IOTA the only: free-to-use (#NoFees), permission-less, open-source and (very soon) decentralized.

#news: IOTA Introduces Azimuth (previously known as NB-PoW): A different approach to proof of work that we are working on as part of our long-term vision for IOTA. Read more about it on the blog and get involved today:  https://t.co/KDPF93Vq3T #IOTA #Azimuth

"With Azimuth, we can replace computational power with direction. When a device uses Azimuth, it doesn’t need to do any work. [...] By using this approach, small #IoT nodes can save energy, extend battery life, and avoid doing those troublesome push-ups." #IOTA  https://t.co/ZaJhGXuSXJ

#IOTA-Primority Partnership: Through the app, consumers can scan any food product in their hands. Using the food barcode and expiration date, the right MAM channel is selected and all the MAM messages containing an expiration date earlier than the indicated one are fetched.  https://t.co/1kwaiHpChv
